New Records: Sanju Samson scored the second-fastest T20I century by an Indian.
India recorded its highest T20I score of 297.
This was the second highest innings total in T20Is, behind Nepal’s 314 for three against Mongolia.
Key Match Events: Samson and Suryakumar had a 173-run second-wicket partnership.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh had a complete meltdown in the 18th over when Litton Das lobbed a throw over the bowler’s head when both batters were stranded at one end.
Off the first ball of the Bangladesh reply, Parvez Hossain Emon was bounced out by Mayank Yadav.
